name: Colorful (Armando Agra)
description:
This is the first Unity game I have ever made. Instructions are in Portuguese, unfortunately.

The game was made for a Game Development class back in 2017, in which we learned the basics of Unity. Game is really short because I started it basically one day before it was due.



Instructions:
Move with WASD, jump with Space.
Change the color you're using by pressing by aiming at one of the colors at the wall and pressing the left button on your mouse

There are 3 levels:
1) Just paint all tiles in any color you like.
2) Paint all tiles. At least 18 tiles in Red, Blue or Cyan (18 of each). Good luck counting!
3) Paint all tiles. All colors must have the same amount of painted tiles. There are 90 tiles in total.
